data.name: Mutant Karate Canary
data.detailed_description:
MUTANT KARATE CANARY is a Fighter/Auto Fighter game that mixes elements from RPGs, Management, Gem Fighters, Rougelte and Arcade games.

Explore the city. Win fights and earn fame, so you can take part in Special Events and unlock more fighters.
Improve your chances of success by giving your fighters buffs and become the best Mutant Karate Fighter in the City.




MKC is a simple fighting game RougeLite.
Each fighter has a base move-set of two attacks, a jump and a block + two Special Moves and a Super.
The Special Moves Level Up when you collect Mutagens.




  • While fighting you can collect MUTAGENS to upgrade your SPECIAL ATTACKS.
  • Play SURVIVAL mode to see how many fighters you can beat in one go.
  • Play a SINGLE fight to practice your skills with a certain fighter.
  • In STORY MODE, when you start a new game, one fighter is added to your roster.
  • While exploring the city you can unlock more Fighters that will join your team of FIGHTERS. When winning fights or completing takes, you get rewarded BUFFS that you can assign to your fighters, to give them an extra edge in the next fight. When all you fighters are defeated you will need a coin to continue and add another fighter. If you are out of COINS the game ends. This mode also features AUTO fighting so you can relax and only do the management.
  • In VERSUS MODE you can challenge your friends to a fight in local PVP.




Play as many MUTANT ANIMALS fighting each other, Hero vs Villains.



Twitter: https://twitter.com/TroldkarlensHat

Warning:

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870800/Mutant_Karate_Canary

data.short_description: MUTANT KARATE CANARY is a Fighting game that mixes elements from RPGs, Management, Rogue lite and Arcade games. Explore the city. Win fights and earn fame. Take part in Special Events to unlock more fighters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
